title: Every Business is a Small Town Business, with Andy Frisella - MFCEO17
description: Whether you operate from Los Angeles, CA or Little Flint, MO, Andy Frisella argues that the internet and social media have created a situation in which every business is a small town business.  If you want to succeed, you have to think like the owner of an old time general store.  Ben Newman and Vaughn Kohler join him in the studio.
